channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Enslaver and Slave
channel.description:
## **Enslaver - Unique Neutral Killer** **Passive (Intimidating)** If you die - your slave will die instead, attacker will get a target change notification, poison and bleeding redirects to slave **Passive (Can't Touch This)** Basically the same as MM except no death immunity **Day Ability (Royal Fall)** You can force a person with Royal blood to be your slave. Cannot be used if you already have a slave. Cannot be used on Prince, King or Pretender. Your target will lose Royal Blood, but you will get one. (1 use) **Night Ability (Forced Slavery)** You enslave a target. cannot enslave royals or night immune targets (infinite uses) **Night Ability (Order)** You order your slave to kill someone. Your slave cannot be redirrected, but they can be occupied, which will cause an attack to fail (infinite uses)
## **Slave - Unique Neutral Support** **Passive (Dependence)** If your master will be attacked, poisoned or bled - you will take his place **Day Ability (Trollbox)** - Basically the same (infinite uses) **Day Ability (Last Opportunity)** On trial if your master is voted up you can force pardon it, can be used only if you had Royal Blood (1 use) **Night Ability (Disobedience)** You can attack someone on your choice (infinite uses)
**Win Condition for both** -Defeat anyone who opposes you.
If slave becomes king he gets king day abilities, but same night ability
Idea is some kind of 3rd faction, with only 2 people alive at the same time. Disobedience can be used if Enslaver gets night immunity occupation bypass, or if he gets jailed, so you will attack on your own. Enslaver does not visit others directly, but instead, as possessor, makes his slave do the job. Slave have abilities to defend his master from being executed, using trollbox or Last Opportunity
Also i think about changing Enslaver to Neutral Special, who will take NK place, but i think there will be too much "neuts out" if it'll happen
So what do you think about that one >_>

Investigative - what are investigatives for? to let leader know the info, i doubt it’ll work since the only thing enslaver can do with it - kill. Or replace slave. Killer - too much for a slave to be able to kill actually. If it’s existed it would be the same assassin. Offensive can work, socials are usually more active at day too and can manipulate others. Gonna think about it too
